content: knit ½ the leg stitches wrap&turn knit back then continue as described above when you have finished the foot and leg chart work the same number of short row over the same number of stitches in the leg in the reverse order then finish as written *** if using a knitting needle instead of a crochet hook you will need to slip 1 as if to knit *slip 1 from the other needle then pass the first stitch over and off the needle binding off one stitch repeat from * until end it is easy to stretch the stitches out a lot while doing it this way so try to avoid that other notes if you need a larger/deeper heel it is perfectly possible to cast on more sts in the heel section cast on in multiples of 4 to be able to use the same heel chart simply adding a repeat on both sides of the centre for the first row use a marker pen to extend the line of marked heel sts in the leg and foot chart to remind yourself to work the heel sts and not the pattern sts each 4 sts cast on will add 4 row which is 2 charted row walking in circles by anne-lise maigaard littlegreendragon © 2021 april page 3 walking in circles by anne-lise maigaard littlegreendragon © 2021 april page 4 trahc gel dna toof foot and leg chart large chart part 1 walking in circles by anne-lise maigaard littlegreendragon © 2021 april page 5 foot and leg chart large chart part 2 walking in circles by anne-lise maigaard littlegreendragon © 2021 april page 6
